## Container.register() method

Registers dependencies with the container via registration objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
register(...params: any[]): Container;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | any\[\] | The registration objects. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Container](./fast-foundation.container.md)
